name: Windows Escalate Locked Desktop Unlocker
author: L4teral <l4teral[4t]gmail com>
Metlstorm
description:
This module unlocks a locked Windows desktop by patching
        the respective code inside the LSASS.exe process. This
        patching process can result in the target system hanging or
        even rebooting, so be careful when using this module on
        production systems.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: REVERT
options.description: Enable this option to revert the in-memory patch and enable locking again
